Title: Dismantling barriers to participation in programming communities with Dr. Denae Ford
Description:
Dr. Denae Ford is a Research Scientist investigating identity-based signals to support retention in Socio-Technical Ecosystems. What does that mean? It's using science to make programming communities more inclusive and welcoming!

  • https://blog.denaeford.me/2019/07/01/how-programmers-really-look-at-pull-requests
  • https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/people/denae/
